function.name: read_file
function.description: Reads a file from the sandbox so the programmer can examine or review code before editing.

function.name: update_file
function.description: Rewrites an existing file with new content. Used for applying bug fixes from validator feedback.

function.name: create_file
function.description: Creates a new file in the sandbox with specified content.

function.name: delete_file
function.description: Deletes a file from the sandbox if no longer needed.

function.name: move_file
function.description: Moves or renames a file inside the sandbox workspace.

function.name: search_web
function.description: Searches the web (DuckDuckGo HTML) for troubleshooting information, errors, or documentation. Programmer uses this before writing code or fixing bugs.

function.name: fetch_web_page
function.description: Fetches full content from a URL to read documentation, API guides, error references, or tutorials.
